Promoted AWS Best Practices, executed AWS Well-Architected framework together with AWS solution architects
Managed >40 EC2 servers across 3 AWS regions, migrated from AWS EC2 Classic to AWS VPC
Updated codebase from PHP5 to PHP 7.4, Go 1.14 Docker 19, PHPUnit 9
Supervised development of serverless microservices in Java/Kotlin/Golang & DynamoDB
Split monorepository into >30 separate repositories with separate CI/CD

Enforced PHPUnit & integration testing, code reviews & code style policies
Migrated application services into containers (Docker)

references.name: Arnd Aschentrup Co-Founder & CEO at Tandem / www.tandem.net
references.reference: Sergei is an outstanding engineer! We have worked together very closely for more than 7 years and during this time Sergei played a decisive role in Tandem’s success. For example, Sergei built Tandem’s complex, high-load backend application, infrastructure and API initially single-handedly, later leading, mentoring and developing our growing backend engineering team. Our backend serves more than 10 million community members with close to perfect uptime, high efficiency and performance across four separate client applications. Sergei always goes above and beyond the day to day responsibilities to solve to a broad spectrum of engineering and IT challenges, such as connectivity for our members in mainland China, building analytics infrastructure + tools and working with all teams to find the best solutions.
